note.p: Death: Fairfield, near Reading, Berkshire (04 March 1928)
Burial: Churchyard of Streatley, near Goring
Education: BA (1875) MA (1878) St John's College, Cambridge
Career: Joined the Geological Survey, doing extensive work in the Isle of Wight; Director of the Geological Survey (1914-1920); retired 1920
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1928 vol 103 pp xvi-xx, plate, by Sir John Smith Flett
Notes: Was awarded the Wollaston Medal of the Geological Society (1919)
